Articles.Content:
Alright so I have KW rocketry installed (that is it), and everything with that is working, but for some reason when I save ships and/or spaceplanes I can not load them from the VAB. They show up in the save file Kerbal Space Program>saves>myprogram>ships>VAB but they do not appear in game.

Has anyone else had this issue and resolved it? Thanks

Do any parts besides KW Rocketry parts appear in the VAB? I once (accidentally) replaced the parts folders with a plugins parts instead of merging them, and it deleted all the stock parts so nothing worked. If the regular parts aren't showing up in the VAB, that's probably what happened. Otherwise I don't know, but I'd bet it was something to do with the way you installed the mod making the parts not usable somehow.

Matt

Actually all of the parts are showing up. It is the actual save files that aren't showing up in the game. The game is working smoothly with all parts but the .craft files of my saved ships do not show.
